humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the pathology report, there are metastases in 2 out of 20 assessed lymph nodes (1 from the sentinel lymph nodes and 1 from the axillary lymph node dissection). This corresponds to N1 based on the AJCC staging system and the new rules provided.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in 1 out of 3 sentinel lymph nodes (2.5 mm largest focus) and in 1 out of 17 lymph nodes from the axillary contents (3.0 mm largest focus). This corresponds to a pathologic N1 stage (pN1a and pN1b).
